video.title: Victoria
video.synopsis: After discovering that her husband of 25 years has been unfaithful, Victoria meets a younger man who shows her that her life is just beginning at 50.

episodes.synopsis: The Mendozas are millionaires who seem happy, but it's only appearance. Among other things, the eldest daughter suffers from eating disorders and the husband is unfaithful.
episodes.title: Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Following her friend Camila's rash advice, Victoria cancels her 25th wedding anniversary celebration with Enrique. He is not happy with his wife or his lover.
episodes.title: Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Enrique doesn't know what he wants. He treats both his wife and his lover badly. Tatiana wants a child with him, but he flatly refuses.
episodes.title: Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: Using his age as an excuse, Enrique leaves Tatiana. He tells her he prefers to save his marriage, that he is too old for her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo uses his smooth conversation to charm Victoria, who laughs at everything he says. Enrique avoids him because he finds him annoying and self-serving.
episodes.title: Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Enrique goes back on his decision of ending his relationship with Tatiana. He tells his family he wants to go to a hotel and think about things.
episodes.title: Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo pursues Victoria. Trouble brews among Victoria's kids. Mariana stops going to class and ends up in a pool hall.
episodes.title: Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Camila doesn't like the way Jerónimo pursues Victoria. Mariana exaggerates the family situation with her father to convince him to return.
episodes.title: Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Enrique meets Victoria in a restaurant to talk about the kids, but Victoria is startled how harsh he is. Jerónimo and his boss happen to come by.
episodes.title: Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: After leaving home, Enrique's fatherly instincts return. He appears to be understanding, helpful and receptive towards his kids.
episodes.title: Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: It seems that pregnancy is making Paula more aware of her father's situation after leaving home, and she tells him he must not feel responsible for his wife's choices.
episodes.title: Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Victoria remembers her life with Enrique and smiles to her mother. The station is celebrating the 1328 emails received since Valeria came to work there.
episodes.title: Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Elisa takes pity on Victoria and her tears and tells her where she can find Mariana. Jerónimo offers to go with her. Jerónimo and Santiago get along.
episodes.title: Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: After the incident with Mariana, the relationship between Victoria and Jerónimo seems to become stronger, while the relationship between Enrique and Tatiana worsens.
episodes.title: Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana is showing signs of boredom with Enrique. Victoria confesses to Camila that Jerónimo's kiss knocked her silly.
episodes.title: Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tires of waiting for Jerónimo in Camila's house and decides to go to Helena's, where she finds Enrique with Tatiana and gets very upset.
episodes.title: Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Mariana looks in the phone directory to see where Jerónimo lives, goes to his house and orders his mother never to interfere again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells her son Santiago what happened with Jerónimo and he gives her his unconditional support. Enrique moves into Tatiana's apartment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Paula decides not to have the baby and tells Sebastián. Mariana leaves school again to see Arturo, but discovers him with a friend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Santiago and Camila are making love and are nearly caught, but manage to avoid it. Camila tells Santiago he can forget everything that happened, because it was a mistake.
episodes.title: Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Enrique offers Paula a job as Tatiana's assistant. Victoria and Jerónimo are in a restaurant where she tells him they can be friends.
episodes.title: Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo finds an excuse to get Victoria to meet him. They have a heated argument, but it all ends with a kiss.
episodes.title: Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Pacho invites Mariana to a party he's throwing at his bar. He tells her they have to take their own drugs, that he can get them, but they are very expensive.
episodes.title: Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Mariana blackmails Paula, threatening to tell Paula's father she is pregnant if she doesn't give her the money to buy drugs at Pacho's party.
episodes.title: Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Paula is feeling bad due to her pregnancy, but decides to go ahead with the abortion anyway. Cynically, Mariana informs Santiago that Paula is on her way to the clinic.
episodes.title: Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián reaches the abortion clinic and finds Paula, who tells him her conscience wouldn't allow her to go through with it. Everybody finds out about her pregnancy.
episodes.title: Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Claudio looks for Camila to ask her forgiveness for everything, and she gives in. Then Santiago arrives and there is a fight. Jerónimo intervenes and is beaten up.
episodes.title: Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Jerónimo come close to having a passionate encounter, but Victoria has second thoughts and leaves the apartment as she feels this may compromise his opinion of her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo quits the station and is out of work. Victoria goes to the doctor to ask about menopause, and he tells her she has nothing to worry about in terms of her sexuality.
episodes.title: Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Victoria asks Carlota about a bottle of liquor she found lying around. Carlota tells her that Santiago is drinking a lot because of his love troubles.
episodes.title: Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Victoria leaves a note for Jerónimo asking him to meet her. They meet at Camila's house. Mariana goes out to buy drugs and is arrested by the police.
episodes.title: Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: While Mariana is under arrest, Victoria spends a lovely evening with Jerónimo. Enrique looks for Victoria and finds her in a very compromising situation.
episodes.title: Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: The police let Mariana go. The Mendoza family has a heated confrontation in which everyone makes their point very clearly. Enrique tells Victoria he wants a divorce.
episodes.title: Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Santiago convinces Camila to go with him to the country estate, where they will have more privacy. Little do they know that their romantic interlude will be discovered.
episodes.title: Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo still can't get a job. Mariana overhears a conversation between her mother and Santiago, and finds out about his relationship with Camila.
episodes.title: Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo and Victoria go to the country estate, where finally they are alone, and he wants to make love to her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Fernando talk about how happy they are in their marriage. Valeria goes to Jerónimo's home to give him good news about his job.
episodes.title: Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Paula visits Enrique in his office to ask him to help Sebastián find a job. Jerónimo signs a new contract with the station.
episodes.title: Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Victoria talks with Paula and advises her on marriage. The celebration is under way for Paula's wedding. Santiago's mother makes very inappropriate comments.
episodes.title: Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: It is Paula's wedding day. Everything goes well until Arturo provokes Mariana and she grabs the microphone after Enrique is done talking.
episodes.title: Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Enrique enters Paula's room, and finds Victoria. He thanks her for organizing the wedding and even tells her she looks nice.
episodes.title: Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Gerardo he saw Victoria and she looks really pretty. Camila takes Victoria to the hairdresser's for a new look. Victoria also updates her wardrobe.
episodes.title: Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Enrique that Mariana wants to leave home. Santiago treats Memo badly and kicks him out of the band. Estrella shows up for an audition with the band.
episodes.title: Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana and Enrique move. Victoria helps Paula pack her things. Camila tells Victoria it is time to implement part three of her plan.
episodes.title: Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Camila tells Victoria to use sexy lingerie to seduce Jerónimo. Victoria replies that she can't use such tactics.
episodes.title: Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Jerónimo dine together. Jerónimo and Victoria arrive at Valeria's party. Victoria tells Jerónimo they should leave the party and go to bed.
episodes.title: Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo and Victoria kiss passionately. Martín calls Jerónimo and tells him he does not feel well. Silvia and Guillermo arrive, and they find Jerónimo and Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Santiago that recently he seems a lot happier. Mariana wakes up Arturo and tells him he has to go home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Enrique he is not hurting Victoria, that he loves her. Jerónimo asks Camila for advice on how to celebrate Victoria's 50th birthday.
episodes.title: Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo asks Henry to help him find a hotel where he can go with Victoria. Enrique calls Tatiana to talk with her, but she refuses.
episodes.title: Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Valeria that the next topic will be the age dilemma among women. Camila and Jerónimo go shopping for Victoria's birthday.
episodes.title: Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Enrique calls Victoria just to ask her how she is doing. Valeria and Tatiana are convinced that Enrique can think of nobody else but Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Victoria realizes the condition in which Paula is living. Santiago tells Lucas that he is beginning to really like Estrella.
episodes.title: Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo and Victoria spend the night together. Jerónimo tells her that reality will be as nice as the night they just spent together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Victoria arrives home to find the surprise waiting for her. Tatiana goes to the apartment and sees the gift Enrique has bought Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: Gerardo talks with Enrique and says he is sorry for showing up at the party that Jerónimo organized for Victoria. Victoria remembers her first night with Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Camila asks Victoria about her night of passion with Jerónimo. Enrique goes looking for Tatiana at Valeria's house. Paula and Sebastián argue about everything.
episodes.title: Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Enrique talks with Gerardo and feigns he is losing everything. Enrique asks Tatiana not to leave the company. Victoria and Paula see Estrella and Santiago kissing.
episodes.title: Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Enrique is drunk in a bar, bitter with Victoria. Jerónimo and Valeria are in the same bar. Enrique sees them and tries to attack Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Victoria that he is convinced she loves him. Otherwise, she would not have made love to him. Enrique tells Paula that he wants to marry Tatiana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Enrique's lawyer shows up at Victoria's home with divorce papers and documents about the division of property. Enrique buys Tatiana an engagement ring.
episodes.title: Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Victoria meets with her friends and tells them Enrique will only leave her the house. Gerardo is very worried about the situation. Victoria gathers her kids together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana shows Valeria the engagement ring Enrique gave her. Paula and Mariana continue to reproach Victoria because of their father's decision.
episodes.title: Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo invites Victoria to dinner. In the restaurant, the waiter takes Victoria for Jerónimo's mother. Enrique tells Tatiana he missed her so much.
episodes.title: Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo looks for Enrique and tells him he will sign anything as long as he does not hurt Victoria anymore.
episodes.title: Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Camila she will leave Jerónimo. Valeria tells Tatiana that Jerónimo and Victoria are no longer together. Fernanda thinks Robert is following her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Gerardo he will ask the doctor for some blue pills so as not to let Tatiana down on their wedding day. Elena offers to help Victoria financially.
episodes.title: Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Paula he will marry Tatiana and hopes to see her at the wedding. Jerónimo arrives at Victoria's house, but she tells him they are over.
episodes.title: Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: Elvis helps Jerónimo enter Dorotea's house. Jerónimo finds Dorotea dead. Victoria tells Enrique she will never see Jerónimo Acosta again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Tatiana they will go to Hawaii for their honeymoon. Victoria tells Camila and Elena that she has decided to accept Enrique's conditions.
episodes.title: Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: Enrique and Tatiana get married. Camila wants to give Fernanda a new look. Victoria organizes a dinner for Estrella's father.
episodes.title: Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Valeria that if he had met her earlier he would have fallen in love with her. Pedro and Estrella arrive for dinner at Victoria's home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Camila goes shopping with Victoria to overcome her depression. Enrique tells Tatiana he will invite Mariana to dinner and give her a car for her birthday.
episodes.title: Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Enrique decides to give Paula and Sebastián an apartment. Victoria is tired of the situation with Enrique and decides to make her own decisions.
episodes.title: Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Victoria reaches Jerónimo's apartment and realizes Valeria is there. Jerónimo follows Victoria and asks her to move in with him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Mariana tells Elisa she betrayed her because she kissed Arturo. Victoria decides to tell her three kids she has gotten back together with Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Victoria, Jerónimo, Fernanda and Santiago think about what they can do to get money. Paula and Santiago accept the relationship between Victoria and Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Enrique invites Tatiana out dancing. Paula helps Sebastián with the proposal he is preparing for the office. Valeria and Jerónimo work until late.
episodes.title: Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana and Enrique go dancing at the place Tatiana chose. Santiago and Estrella have sex in the car. Jerónimo arrives at Victoria's house to pick up the desserts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Elena suggests Victoria should have a get-together in her house to share dessert. Carlota tells Victoria she would like to become her partner and Victoria accepts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Tatiana he wants to change his car and update his wardrobe. Santiago tells Victoria he will help out selling desserts at the university.
episodes.title: Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana tells Valeria to invent a business trip so she can go with Jerónimo. All the ladies in Elena's house love the desserts.
episodes.title: Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Enrique goes to buy his sports car with Tatiana. Tatiana tells Enrique it might not be the best choice in case they decide to have kids.
episodes.title: Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Enrique shows Gerardo his new car. Gerardo tells Enrique that instead of spending all that money, he should give it to Victoria who really needs it.
episodes.title: Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana wants to have a baby with Enrique and decides to act upon it without telling him. Valeria tells Tatiana she plans on becoming Victoria's best friend.
episodes.title: Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Valeria and Jerónimo reach the pools, do a sound test and Jerónimo tells Valeria he is angry at her for not telling him about her love disappointment.
episodes.title: Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Victoria gets to Paula's house. Paula tells her she argued with Sebastián because he had found out that it was thanks to Enrique that he got his job.
episodes.title: Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Enrique try to calm Paula down. Valeria is upset because Jerónimo tells her they will never be more than good friends.
episodes.title: Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tries to convince Jerónimo not to marry Victoria. Victoria tells Carlota that Santiago and Estrella have decided to live together.
episodes.title: Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Enrique does not feel good about his situation with his kids and with Victoria. Gerardo tells him to give Victoria back everything she is entitled to.
episodes.title: Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Valeria confesses to Jerónimo that she loves him, but he is asleep and does not hear anything. Paula leaves the hospital and goes to Victoria's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo arrives at Victoria's house, he kisses and hugs her, tells her he missed her. Silvia asks Jerónimo to sign the authorization to get Martín out of the country.
episodes.title: Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Elisa tells Mariana that Pacho raped her. Jerónimo calls Victoria on the phone. Tatiana is happy because of a project that will make her a lot of money.
episodes.title: Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Camila arrives at Victoria's house with the news that she must go on a trip because she has an appointment with the supermaket manager, and shows her the airline ticket.
episodes.title: Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo and Mariana go into Elisa's house and realize she has cut her wrists. Mariana tells Jerónimo about how Pacho raped both herself and Elisa.
episodes.title: Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Mariana tells Victoria the whole truth. Enrique leaves the office early and Tatiana goes with him to make him some dinner.
episodes.title: Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana calls Enrique on his cell phone to tell him she is waiting, but he says he cannot make it because of a very serious situation with Mariana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: Enrique decides to spend the night at Victoria's house to watch over Mariana. Elena realizes Arturo is not home and he has left a note.
episodes.title: Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Jerónimo she is going to ask Tatiana to help him with the lawsuit Silvia filed. Elena looks for Victoria and asks for her forgiveness.
episodes.title: Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana explains to Valeria that she has not yet had a chance to tell Enrique about the pregnancy. Camila tells Victoria that Meme already knows what happened to Mariana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Jerónimo that Tatiana will find a lawyer to help with the problem he has with Silvia. Paula talks to Victoria to calm herself.
episodes.title: Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Mariana tells Enrique and Victoria that she likes seeing them together. Jerónimo and Tatiana meet so Tatiana can introduce him to the lawyer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Fernanda and Paula that Enrique has decided to give her what she has a right to from the divorce. Castro fires Guillermo and promotes Valeria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Meme tells Jerónimo that Victoria will go back to Enrique. Paula thanks Jerónimo for having arrived at the right moment, when she was about to go ahead with the abortion.
episodes.title: Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo and Victoria spend the night together. Jerónimo tells Victoria that Valeria helped him find a lawyer to defend him in Martín's case.
episodes.title: Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: Silvia warns Jerónimo she will do everything she can to take away any legal authority he has over Martín. Silvia is crossing the road when a truck hits and kills her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Martín that Silvia died in an accident. Paula announces to her family that the baby is a girl. Valeria tries to console Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Victoria calls Jerónimo to express her condolences for Silvia's death. Victoria shows up at Silvia's funeral, and Martín yells for her to leave.
episodes.title: Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana introduces Sebastián to the whole company. She calls a friend to get Santiago in contact with Franco, a music producer.
episodes.title: Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Jerónimo decide to take a break. Tatiana tells Enrique that Franco, the producer, will audition Santiago and his band.
episodes.title: Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Camila tells her friends she has cancer. She tells Victoria that she's an idiot for leaving the man she loves in another woman's arms.
episodes.title: Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells the family that Mariana is coming home from the clinic. She is organizing a welcome home dinner for her and plans to invite Enrique.
episodes.title: Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana asks Enrique why he didn't tell her he had a dinner at Victoria's house, and she complains that he forgot their anniversary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Victoria that every time he goes to her house, he feels it is his home too, and the memories sadden him. Victoria avoids him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana tells Enrique that she is still upset because he forgot their anniversary. Enrique confesses to Gerardo that he wants to get his family back.
episodes.title: Capítulo 115

episodes.synopsis: Victoria dresses young and asks Paula what to talk about with an 11-year old. Paula tells her to just be herself. Jerónimo is happy to see Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 116

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Victoria that Enrique is in the hospital. Tatiana cannot believe she knew nothing about his health, and she feels guilty for what happened.
episodes.title: Capítulo 117

episodes.synopsis: The doctor explains that Enrique needs an operation that has long-term effects. Enrique tells Tatiana they can't go on, and that she needs to get on her with her life.
episodes.title: Capítulo 118

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Victoria he regrets having left his family, and that he is done with Tatiana. Victoria tells Jerónimo that Enrique will live in their home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 119

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo arrives home and Martín says he got an email offering him the job in Spain. He is told to go.
episodes.title: Capítulo 120

episodes.synopsis: Paula tells Tatiana that she never doubted her love for Enrique and has nothing against her. Gerardo convinces Tatiana not to leave the firm.
episodes.title: Capítulo 121

episodes.synopsis: Bernardo calls Victoria to confirm whether Camila had the tests done. Tatiana gives José two boxes and a suitcase with Enrique's belongings.
episodes.title: Capítulo 122

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells Enrique that everything is ready for him to stay in the house and she has hired two nurses. Valeria comes to Victoria's house looking for Mariana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 123

episodes.synopsis: Camila and Victoria prepare everything for the surgery. Camila decides not to talk about it. Tatiana gets a call from the lawyer who is processing her divorce from Enrique.
episodes.title: Capítulo 124

episodes.synopsis: Victoria confirms to her friends that Enrique is home. Tatiana cries over Enrique's departure. Mariana tells Enrique and Victoria that she is going to work in radio.
episodes.title: Capítulo 125

episodes.synopsis: Enrique asks Victoria for forgiveness and tells her he regrets having hurt her. He implores her to forgive him, to give him another chance.
episodes.title: Capítulo 126

episodes.synopsis: Fernanda tells Victoria she was the woman with Gerardo. Enrique calls Jerónimo and says he needs to talk to him about Mariana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 127

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Jerónimo that he also loves Victoria. Jerónimo tells Enrique he wants to reject the job offer in Spain in order to stay with Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 128

episodes.synopsis: Victoria insists Jerónimo should go to Spain. Federico introduces Mariana to the company employees. Samuel tries to calm Estrella.
episodes.title: Capítulo 129

episodes.synopsis: Mariana tells her family she accepted the job offer at the radio station. Santiago calls Victoria to tell her Pedro died.
episodes.title: Capítulo 130

episodes.synopsis: Valeria comes to Victoria's house to tell her she hates her. She damages Victoria's car and wants to hit her, but Fernanda and Cristina hold her off until Tatiana arrives.
episodes.title: Capítulo 131

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Castro he won't accept his job offer because he is going to Spain. Elena tells her friends she is pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 132

episodes.synopsis: Franco is very happy with Santiago's song and hands him the contract for him to read and sign. Gerardo tells Enrique he is going to be a father again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 133

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Martín to prepare his bags as they are leaving Spain for two months. Enrique tells Victoria he wants to renew their vows on their wedding anniversary.
episodes.title: Capítulo 134

episodes.synopsis: Enrique calls Victoria to invite her to dinner. Martín and Jerónimo return. Jerónimo asks Henry about Victoria.
episodes.title: Capítulo 135

episodes.synopsis: Enrique and Victoria tell their kids that they want to renew their vows. Enrique is at a dealership resolving a wind-damage problem.
episodes.title: Capítulo 136

episodes.synopsis: Mariana tells Paula that Jerónimo is back from Spain. Enrique tries to make love to Victoria, but she pulls away.
episodes.title: Capítulo 137

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Tatiana he will remarry Victoria. Valeria tells Tatiana she should let Enrique know she is having his child.
episodes.title: Capítulo 138

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana tells Enrique she will wait for him Saturday afternoon in the apartment. Enrique tells Gerardo he feels guilty for talking with Tatiana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 139

episodes.synopsis: Camila and Victoria celebrate Camila's recovery. Enrique goes to Tatiana's apartment to arrange the dealership issue. He sees Tatiana with Felipe.
episodes.title: Capítulo 140

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana tells Enrique she misled herself into thinking he would be happy to find out she was pregnant.
episodes.title: Capítulo 141

episodes.synopsis: Victoria meets Jerónimo and tells him that Enrique has newly proposed. Penélope joins Jerónimo and Victoria, she hugs him and kisses him.
episodes.title: Capítulo 142

episodes.synopsis: Enrique complains to Victoria because Jerónimo is present at Santiago's release. Victoria tells Enrique she is ready to rebuild their lives.
episodes.title: Capítulo 143

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Henry that Victoria has rebuilt her life with Enrique and the best thing is for him to do the same with Penélope.
episodes.title: Capítulo 144

episodes.synopsis: Tatiana prepares to see Enrique. When she opens the door, she sees Gerardo. Enrique tells Victoria they will spend their honeymoon on the Greek islands.
episodes.title: Capítulo 145

episodes.synopsis: Enrique arrives home and tells Victoria they are going out for dinner. She chooses a restaurant, but when they get there they find Jerónimo and Penélope are there too.
episodes.title: Capítulo 146

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Victoria and Enrique that when he returns to Madrid he will live with Penélope. Victoria tells Jerónimo she is going on a honeymoon with Enrique.
episodes.title: Capítulo 147

episodes.synopsis: Enrique calls Tatiana and tells her that in the evening he will go to her apartment so they can discuss the child. Tatiana tells Enrique she is only asking for respect.
episodes.title: Capítulo 148

episodes.synopsis: Enrique meets Felipe and is happy to see him. Jerónimo tells Penélope that Camila has discovered true love with Bernardo Solís.
episodes.title: Capítulo 149

episodes.synopsis: Victoria hears Enrique return and goes to see him. She tells him he doesn't look well, and to call her if he needs anything. Enrique tells Gerardo he went to see Tatiana.
episodes.title: Capítulo 150

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián thanks Diana and tells her he wishes she were his mother. Victoria surprises Sebastián and Diana while they kiss and asks them to leave her home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 151

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Henry that he met with Valeria, who told him Tatiana is expecting Enrique's baby. Enrique approaches Victoria because he wants to spend the night with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 152

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Victoria that while she is away he will get ahead with work. Victoria tells Fernanda that she prays to God to never to see Jerónimo again.
episodes.title: Capítulo 153

episodes.synopsis: Sebastián looks for Paula in the office, but she asks him to wait for her at home. He confesses having kissed Diana. Victoria meets Penélope in the hospital.
episodes.title: Capítulo 154

episodes.synopsis: Enrique arrives at Tatiana's home and ends up making love to her. He confesses this to Gerardo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 155

episodes.synopsis: Paula tells Victoria that Sebastián wants to take the child away from her, but she will not allow it. Gerardo tells Enrique he will have to take Felipe home.
episodes.title: Capítulo 156

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Martín to go to his grandfather's in the evening, as he wants to prepare a romantic dinner for Penélope. Victoria tries to seduce Enrique.
episodes.title: Capítulo 157

episodes.synopsis: Valeria tells Enrique that he must let Victoria know about the child. Victoria tells Santiago that Jerónimo is very much in love with his fiancé.
episodes.title: Capítulo 158

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Victoria that Tatiana had his child. He also tells her that the boy is not to blame, whatever the decision.
episodes.title: Capítulo 159

episodes.synopsis: Henry asks Jerónimo if he has spoken with Victoria. Victoria tells her friends that Tatiana's child is Enrique's.
episodes.title: Capítulo 160

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Tatiana that he told Victoria about Felipe, and says he wants to take care of the child. Enrique and Tatiana go to the park with their son.
episodes.title: Capítulo 161

episodes.synopsis: Felipe falls and Enrique takes him to the doctor. Victoria and Jerónimo reach Jerónimo's apartment, they want to be together, but Victoria changes her mind.
episodes.title: Capítulo 162

episodes.synopsis: Victoria tells her friends what happened with Jerónimo. Paula speaks to Vicky and tells her she will always love her, and that is why she must leave her with her father.
episodes.title: Capítulo 163

episodes.synopsis: Victoria and Jerónimo remember meeting in the corridor. Enrique asks about Victoria and Jerónimo. Victoria and Jerónimo kiss, Enrique sees them and hits Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 164

episodes.synopsis: Enrique tells Victoria they should proceed with their wedding plans, but she says she cannot go ahead, because she still loves Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 165

episodes.synopsis: Jerónimo tells Penélope it is over between them. Enrique prepares his bags to go to a hotel. Paula, Santiago and Mariana arrive at Tatiana's house.
episodes.title: Capítulo 166

episodes.synopsis: Victoria calls Jerónimo's number and Penélope answers, so she hangs up. Penélope leaves Jerónimo's house. Enrique offers Paula a job in the law firm.
episodes.title: Capítulo 167

episodes.synopsis: Victoria arrive at Jerónimo's apartment. Martín asks her to forgive him for having always behaved so badly with her. Victoria and Jerónimo speak on the phone.
episodes.title: Capítulo 168

episodes.synopsis: Camila looks for Bernardo, but he won't see her. Victoria spends the night with Jerónimo. Enrique arrives at Tatiana's house to see Felipe, and spends the night with her.
episodes.title: Capítulo 169

episodes.synopsis: Mariana admits to Victoria she suffers from bulimia. Enrique tells Gerardo he has decided to go back to Tatiana. Paula tells her father she quit the corporation.
episodes.title: Capítulo 170

episodes.synopsis: Mariana has her first sexual relationship with Andrés. Camila gathers the whole family so they can convince Victoria to go with Jerónimo.
episodes.title: Capítulo 171
